name: Game A Week - Week 2
description:
With nothing but the open circuit you must race around as fast as you can to complete the fastest lap, the only issue is: The ball won't move!! That's okay just rotate the world instead! In this game you must attempt to orientate the map to move the ball around the track in the fastest time that you can.

Controls:
  • W:- Rotate world forwards
  • S:- Rotate world backwards
  • A:- Rotate world left
  • D:- Rotate world right
  • Left Shift:- Increase tilt speed
  • Esc:- Pause
Assets Used:
  • Paladins font by Inconian Fonts on FontSpace.
